desc: Find great prices on bulk hot melt and equipment at Hotmelt.com. Shop glue guns, glue sticks, PUR hot melt and water based adhesives or call 877-933-3343.

layout.text: Hot Melt Adhesives & Dispensing Equipment Made Easy

We help you identify and source the right hot melt solutions for your needs. With expert advice from our team, our huge product catalog, and industry best prices, Hotmelt.com helps companies of all sizes choose the right products, keep costs low, and keep operations running smoothly.
